roleset.name: like, prefer

example.name: NP object
example.text: Pro-forma balance sheets clearly show why Cray Research favored the spinoff .

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Mary favored her paramour John with a single chaste kiss.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'favor' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class admire-31.2, other framed members include like.
